page.title: 05ST.MARGARET'S BAY TRUST
page.content:
The St.Margaret's Bay Trust was founded in 1970 by Mr.Cleary. He bought South Sands House and turned it into a museum and beautiful garden. Then people started to join the trust. The trust has bought the St.Margaret's house which is now a youth club,the old school which has a joined on library. Cliff House,in the village, was bought and converted into flats. The Glebe land,which is next to the Church and village hall was bought along with the Pines Gardens.
The Trustees don't ask for funds but they wouldn't refuse an appropriate gift.They hope that their renovations help all who live in or visit St.Margaret's Bay.
